creator: jani.kaarela@accenture.com
text:
Created attachment 1879
Diff for a simple fix.

Marking as invalid.  Use a nested <filterchain> and use the <prefixlines> - 
that is the reason this task exists.  Or, use <property> with the 'prefix' 
attribute if all you want is properties prefixed.  Or do you want filter which 
properties get loaded by prefix?  If so, use the <linecontains> or 
<linecontainsregexp> filterchain.

<prefixlines> will prefix comments and create properties out of them, too! 
Using <property file="foo.properties" prefix="props"/> would be otherwise okay, 
but what if the user wants to use a filterchain?

creator: jakarta@ehatchersolutions.com
text:
There is also a <striplinecomments> filter reader that you could use before 
<prefixlines> that would accomplish what you want.
